<< We are also, trying to build her
immune system with herbs. The stuff we got was "Respiratory &Lung support

one....follow your heart.

Julie

let's try this again, last mail i sent was blank, i think!--weeks late but i
wanted to mention that we have several wheezy types in our family and we have
had great luck with a dairy-free diet and regular chiropractor visits and
chestal. a cough expectorant available in the health food store--all natural,
no alcohol.
bridget
